Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- Town of Chatham
PW School District -- Local Option - Term Limits
Race.FullText:
"LOCAL OPTION ELECTION
Within Jackson Parish School District:
Shall the number of terms of office that any member of the school board may serve be limited to three consecutive four-year terms?"

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ (Council on Aging) -- 2.5 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
(Council on the Aging)

Summary:  10 year, 2.5 mills property tax renewal for constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and supporting facilities, programs and activities for the elderly in the Parish through the Jackson Council on the Aging.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Jackson, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a tax of two and one-half (2.5) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $555,000 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2024, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and supporting facilities and programs for the elderly in the Parish through the Jackson Council on the Aging?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ (Health Unit) --  .75 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Millage)
(Health Unit)

Summary:  10 year, .75 mill property tax for maintaining, operating and supporting the Jackson Parish Public Health Unit.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Jackson, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a three-quarters of one (.75) mill tax on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $165,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of maintaining, operating and supporting the Jackson Parish Public Health Unit?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury -- 2% Hotel Occup. Tax - PJ - 10 yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition

Summary:  10 year, 2% hotel/motel/bed & breakfast/lodge/overnight camping facilities tax for the purpose of providing funds for the operation of the Jackson Parish Tourist Commission.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Jackson, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to levy and collect a tax of two percent (2%) (the "Tax"), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning January 1, 2013, upon the rent or fee charged for the occupancy of hotel/motel/bed & breakfast/lodge/overnight camping facilities within the jurisdiction of the Jackson Parish Tourist Commission (said Tax to be in addition to any other taxes thereon) (an estimated $5,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) for the purpose of providing funds for the operation of the Jackson Parish Tourist Commission?
